Entry: Name criticism of the interpretation of Sunni Islam in Saudi Arabia.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "指名批评沙特阿拉伯对逊尼派伊斯兰教的解释。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "تسمية نقد تفسير الإسلام السني في المملكة العربية السعودية."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Crítica nominal a la interpretación del islam suní en Arabia Saudí."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Nennen Sie Kritik an der Auslegung des sunnitischen Islam in Saudi-Arabien."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Назовите критику интерпретации суннитского ислама в Саудовской Аравии."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Suudi Arabistan'da Sünni İslam'ın yorumlanmasına yönelik eleştirilerin adı."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Nome da crítica à interpretação do Islã sunita na Arábia Saudita."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "批評沙特阿拉伯對遜尼派伊斯蘭教的解釋。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "सऊदी अरब में सुन्नी इस्लाम की व्याख्या का नाम आलोचना।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "انتقاد نام از تفسیر اسلام سنی در عربستان سعودی."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Noem kritiek op die interpretasie van Sunni -Islam in Saoedi -Arabië."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Qamba Ukugxekwa kwencazelo yeSunni Islam eSaudi Arabia."}]

Entry: So many mistakes have been made in the interpretation of Sunni Islam in Saudi Arabia that this religion no longer has any real basis.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "沙特阿拉伯在解释逊尼派伊斯兰教时犯了如此多的错误，以至于这一宗教不再有任何真正的基础。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "لقد ارتكبت أخطاء كثيرة في تفسير الإسلام السني في المملكة العربية السعودية بحيث لم يعد لهذا الدين أي أساس حقيقي."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Se han cometido tantos errores en la interpretación del islam suní en Arabia Saudí que esta religión ya no tiene ninguna base real."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Bei der Auslegung des sunnitischen Islams in Saudi-Arabien sind so viele Fehler gemacht worden, dass diese Religion keine wirkliche Grundlage mehr hat."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "В интерпретации суннитского ислама в Саудовской Аравии было допущено так много ошибок, что эта религия больше не имеет реальной основы."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Suudi Arabistan'da Sünni İslam'ın yorumlanmasında o kadar çok hata yapıldı ki, bu dinin artık gerçek bir temeli kalmadı."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Foram cometidos tantos erros na interpretação do Islã sunita na Arábia Saudita que essa religião não tem mais nenhuma base real."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "在沙特阿拉伯對遜尼派伊斯蘭教的解釋中，已經犯了許多錯誤，以至於這種宗教不再具有任何真實的基礎。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "सऊदी अरब में सुन्नी इस्लाम की व्याख्या में इतनी गलतियाँ की गई हैं कि इस धर्म का अब कोई वास्तविक आधार नहीं है।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "بنابراین بسیاری از اشتباهات در تفسیر اسلام سنی در عربستان سعودی انجام شده است که این دین دیگر هیچ پایه و اساس واقعی ندارد."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Daar is soveel foute begaan in die interpretasie van die Sunni -Islam in Saoedi -Arabië dat hierdie godsdiens nie meer 'n werklike basis het nie."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Kwenziwe amaphutha amaningi ekuhunyushweni kwamaSunni Islam eSaudi Arabia lapho le nkolo ayisanasisekelo sangempela."}]

Entry: The interpretation of Sunni Islam in Saudi Arabia is a misinterpretation of Islam.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "沙特阿拉伯对伊斯兰教逊尼派的解释是对伊斯兰教的曲解。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "تفسير الإسلام السني في المملكة العربية السعودية هو تفسير خاطئ للإسلام."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "La interpretación del islam suní en Arabia Saudí es una interpretación errónea del islam."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Die Auslegung des sunnitischen Islam in Saudi-Arabien ist eine Fehlinterpretation des Islam."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Интерпретация суннитского ислама в Саудовской Аравии - это неправильное толкование ислама."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Suudi Arabistan'daki Sünni İslam yorumu, İslam'ın yanlış yorumlanmasıdır."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "A interpretação do Islã sunita na Arábia Saudita é uma interpretação errônea do Islã."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "在沙特阿拉伯，對遜尼派伊斯蘭教的解釋是對伊斯蘭教的誤解。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "सऊदी अरब में सुन्नी इस्लाम की व्याख्या इस्लाम की गलत व्याख्या है।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "تفسیر اسلام سنی در عربستان سعودی ، تفسیر نادرست از اسلام است."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Die interpretasie van die Soennitiese Islam in Saoedi -Arabië is 'n verkeerde interpretasie van Islam."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ukuhunyushwa kweSunni Islam eSaudi Arabia ukuhunyushwa kabi kwama-Islam."}]
